title: iboss - Digital Experience
description: This dashboard provides insights into end-user digital experiences by analyzing latency and response times across users, resources, countries, and assets.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides insights into end-user digital experiences by analyzing latency and response times across users, resources, countries, and assets.

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
